languages.text: {n}Вы ощущаете, как струны ирреальной силы, исходящие из пальцев колдуна, опутывают огромный диск пробивного бура. Питая его священные батареи своей нечестивой магией, словно Движущей силой, чародей подчиняет творение Механикус своей воле.{/n}

{n}You can feel the strings of the surreal force emanating from the sorcerer's fingers and wrapping around the enormous disc of the drill. He is feeding its sacred batteries with his profane magic as if it were the Motive Force, subjugating the Tech-Priests' creation to his will.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы ощущаете, как струны ирреальной силы, исходящие из пальцев колдуна, опутывают огромный диск пробивного бура. Питая его священные батареи своей нечестивой магией, словно Движущей силой, чародей подчиняет творение Механикус своей воле.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can feel the strings of the surreal force emanating from the sorcerer's fingers and wrapping around the enormous disc of the drill. He is feeding its sacred batteries with his profane magic as if it were the Motive Force, subjugating the Tech-Priests' creation to his will.{/n}

{n}You can feel the strings of the surreal force emanating from the sorcerer's fingers and wrapping around the enormous disc of the drill. He is feeding its sacred batteries with his profane magic as if it were the Motive Force, subjugating the Tech-Priests' creation to his will.{/n}

{n}You can feel the strings of the surreal force emanating from the sorcerer's fingers and wrapping around the enormous disc of the drill. He is feeding its sacred batteries with his profane magic as if it were the Motive Force, subjugating the Tech-Priests' creation to his will.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你感觉那个巫师的手指发出了超越现实的力量，缠绕在巨大的钻头圆盘上。他正在用他亵渎性的力量为钻头的神圣电池提供能量，就像提供源力一样，让技术神甫的造物臣服在他的意志之下。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can feel the strings of the surreal force emanating from the sorcerer's fingers and wrapping around the enormous disc of the drill. He is feeding its sacred batteries with his profane magic as if it were the Motive Force, subjugating the Tech-Priests' creation to his will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你感觉那个巫师的手指发出了超越现实的力量，缠绕在巨大的钻头圆盘上。他正在用他亵渎性的力量为钻头的神圣电池提供能量，就像提供原初动力一样，让技术祭司的造物臣服在他的意志之下。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous sentez les fils de force occulte qui émanent des doigts du sorcier pour s'enrouler autour du gigantesque disque de la foreuse. Il alimente ses batteries sacrées avec sa magie profane comme s'il s'agissait de la Force Motrice, soumettant la création des technoprêtres à sa volonté.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can feel the strings of the surreal force emanating from the sorcerer's fingers and wrapping around the enormous disc of the drill. He is feeding its sacred batteries with his profane magic as if it were the Motive Force, subjugating the Tech-Priests' creation to his will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous sentez les fils de force occulte qui émanent des doigts du sorcier pour s'enrouler autour du gigantesque disque de la foreuse. Il alimente ses batteries sacrées avec sa magie profane comme s'il s'agissait de la Force Motrice, soumettant la création des technoprêtres à sa volonté.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソーサラーの指から超現実的な力の糸が発せられ、ドリルの巨大な円盤に巻き付いているのが感じられる。彼はそれを動力であるかのように神聖なるバッテリーに不敬な魔力を送り込み、技術司祭の創造物を意のままに操っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can feel the strings of the surreal force emanating from the sorcerer's fingers and wrapping around the enormous disc of the drill. He is feeding its sacred batteries with his profane magic as if it were the Motive Force, subjugating the Tech-Priests' creation to his will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソーサラーの指から超現実的な力の糸が発せられ、ドリルの巨大な円盤に巻き付いているのが感じられる。彼はそれを動力であるかのように神聖なるバッテリーに不敬な魔力を送り込み、技術司祭の創造物を意のままに操っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Puedes sentir las hebras de energía irreal que emanan de los dedos del hechicero y cubren el inmenso disco del taladro. Alimenta las baterías sagradas con su blasfema magia como si de la Fuerza Motriz se tratara, subyugando la creación de los tecnosacerdotes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can feel the strings of the surreal force emanating from the sorcerer's fingers and wrapping around the enormous disc of the drill. He is feeding its sacred batteries with his profane magic as if it were the Motive Force, subjugating the Tech-Priests' creation to his will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Puedes sentir las hebras de energía irreal que emanan de los dedos del hechicero y cubren el inmenso disco del taladro. Alimenta las baterías sagradas con su blasfema magia como si de la Fuerza Motriz se tratara, subyugando la creación de los tecnosacerdotes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du spürst die Fäden der surrealen Kraft von den Fingern des Hexers ausgehen und sich um die enorme Scheibe des Bohrers winden. Er speist seine heiligen Batterien mit seiner profanen Magie, als wäre diese die Antriebskraft, unterwirft die Schöpfung der Techpriester seinem Willen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can feel the strings of the surreal force emanating from the sorcerer's fingers and wrapping around the enormous disc of the drill. He is feeding its sacred batteries with his profane magic as if it were the Motive Force, subjugating the Tech-Priests' creation to his will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du spürst die Fäden der surrealen Kraft von den Fingern des Hexers ausgehen und sich um die enorme Scheibe des Bohrers winden. Er speist seine heiligen Batterien mit seiner profanen Magie, als wäre diese die Antriebskraft, unterwirft die Schöpfung der Techpriester seinem Willen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sahirin parmaklarından yayılıp devasa matkap diskinin etrafına dolanan gerçek dışı gücün ipliklerini hissedebiliyorsun. Matkabın kutsal bataryalarını, Devinim Gücü'ymüşçesine kendi kâfirce sihriyle besliyor; Tekno Rahiplerin icadını, kendi iradesine boyun eğmeye zorluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can feel the strings of the surreal force emanating from the sorcerer's fingers and wrapping around the enormous disc of the drill. He is feeding its sacred batteries with his profane magic as if it were the Motive Force, subjugating the Tech-Priests' creation to his will.{/n}
